TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract sealed beforefieldinit AddInStore extends System.Object
public ref class AddInStore abstract sealed

summary.span: 提供用來儲存及尋找可用增益集和管線區段相關資訊的方法。

span.span: Provides methods to store and find information about available add-ins and pipeline segments.

remarks.format:
## Remarks 下表中所述，使用這個類別來建置、 重建和更新兩個快取檔案。Use this class to build, rebuild, and update two cache files, as described in the following table. |快取檔案Cache file|建立檔案的方法Methods that create the file| |----------------|----------------------------------| |PipelineSegments.storePipelineSegments.store

這個檔案位於管線目錄結構的根目錄。This file is located in the root directory of the pipeline directory structure.|

以新的管線區段中更新檔案。Updates the file with new pipeline segments. 如果已不安裝任何新的區段，則這個方法只會驗證快取。If no new segments are installed, this method just validates the cache.



重建該檔案，並且包含新的管線區段。Rebuilds the file and includes new pipeline segments.| |AddIns.storeAddIns.store

這個檔案位於包含一或多個增益集子目錄的目錄。This file is located in a directory that contains one or more add-in subdirectories. 如果此目錄位於管線目錄結構，其必須為增益集。If this directory is in the pipeline directory structure, it must be named AddIns.|

使用新的增益集的指定位置來更新檔。Updates the file with new add-ins at a specified location. 如果您的增益集管線目錄結構以外，請呼叫這個方法。Call this method if your add-ins are outside the pipeline directory structure.

如果已不安裝任何新的增益集，則這個方法只會驗證快取。If no new add-ins are installed, this method just validates the cache.



重建該檔案，並且包含增益集在指定的位置。Rebuilds the file and includes add-ins at a specified location. 如果您的增益集管線目錄結構以外，請呼叫這個方法。Call this method if your add-ins are outside the pipeline directory structure.



如果增益集管線目錄結構中，這個方法會以新的增益集更新檔案。If the add-ins are in the pipeline directory structure, this method updates the file with new add-ins.



如果增益集管線目錄結構中，這個方法就會重建該檔案，並且包含新的增益集。If the add-ins are in the pipeline directory structure, this method rebuilds the file and includes new add-ins.| 如果先前存在，這些方法會建立快取檔案。These methods create the cache files if they do not previously exist. 建立快取檔案之後，使用方法來檢查檔案，找出所有的增益集符合指定的主機 檢視的增益集。After the cache files are created, use the method to examine the files to find all add-ins that match a specified host view of the add-in. 您也可以使用方法來尋找特定的增益集。You can also use the method to find a specific add-in. > [!IMPORTANT] > 它不支援允許不受信任的使用者或實體存取 PipelineSegments.store 和 Addins.store。It is unsupported to allow untrusted users or entities to access PipelineSegments.store and Addins.store. 如此一來，可能會導致資料損毀問題的應用程式。Doing so can cause data corruption issues for applications. ## Examples 下列範例示範如何更新快取檔案。The following example shows how to update cache files. [!code-csharp[AddInP3Host#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/addinP3Host/cs/P3Host.cs#2)] [!code-vb[AddInP3Host#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/addinP3Host/vb/p3host.vb#2)]

span.span: Add-Ins and Extensibility

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果找到單一管線的增益集，則會在唯一的項目集合。If a single pipeline for an add-in is found, it will be the only item in the collection. 如果找不到指定的增益集的多個管線，您可以區別它們藉由檢查屬性。If multiple pipelines to the specified add-in are found, you can differentiate them by examining the property. ## Examples 下列範例會尋找特定的增益集。The following example finds a specific add-in. span.span: Currently the only value in this enumeration is the directory specified by the property that was used to set up the host's application domain.

param.span: (選擇性)

span.span: (Optional).

span.span: The path of the directory that contains one or more subdirectories of add-ins. Because this parameter takes an array of strings, you can specify more than one path.

param.span: 如果增益集位於 AddIns 資料夾下的管線目錄結構內，則不需要這個參數。

span.span: This parameter is not required if your add-ins are located in the pipeline directory structure under the AddIns folder.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您可以使用此方法多載，讓部分信任的主應用程式不能有路徑探索權限，來探索它自己的位置，在它自己的目錄中尋找增益集。Use this method overload to enable a partially trusted host, which may not have path discovery permission to discover its own location, to find add-ins in its own directory.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法會檢查快取增益集和管線區段的資訊來尋找所有增益集，符合指定的存放區檔案`hostAddInView`型別。This method examines the store files of cached add-in and pipeline segment information to find all add-ins that match a specified `hostAddInView` type. 您可以在傳回，然後使用其中一個語彙基元集合，以啟用特定的增益集，藉由呼叫方法類別。You can then use one of the tokens in the returned collection to activate a specific add-in by calling the method of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果增益集管線目錄結構中，這個方法也會更新增益集快取。This method also updates the add-ins cache if the add-ins are in the pipeline directory structure. 如果沒有任何新的管線區段或增益集，則這個方法只會驗證快取。If there are no new pipeline segments or add-ins, this method just validates the cache. ## Examples 下列範例示範如何更新快取檔案。The following example shows how to update the cache files. 此程式碼範例是針對提供之較大範例的一部分類別。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class.
